page.title: 02 BEAR FLAT
page.content: The Bear Flat is the centre of our kilometre square that we have been studying.However,it has nothing to do with bears as you might think.On the Bear Flat there are many shops and the most well known public attraction is the Bear Inn.This Inn is well noted for the large polar bear that sits on the porch of the entrance.The Bear Flat is in the Lyncombe Ward of which the population is 5313.Leading off from the Bear Flat are 4 Edwardian avenues. Also in the region of the Bear Flat area is a sloping playing field which is used by many members of the public.Right next to the playing field are some allotments which are mainly used by the residents around them.There are many different houses in the area that were built in different centuries.
